name: Lantern of Banishment
description:
Story

A little game about an adventurer that returns to his home village from his journey, seeing all of his village and those who once lived there turned into scarecrows. With his trusty Lantern he can banish any monster back to the dark realm where they originally came from and cleanse his village off of this cruel curse that has come upon them.

Gameplay

 The  light of the Lantern is very lethal against these pesky monsters! You will have to banish all monster that are coming from the nearby Mine, to save the adventurers village by going up a monster and shining the light on them, but the Lantern has not that much power like it used to. The Lantern only works a specific amount of time and has to recharge to perform the next attack.

Controls

A / D = Move

Space = Jump

W / S = Look Up / Down

LMB / Shift / F = Lantern
